column4: thanks, there is no snd-pcm-oss, what to do? I modified modprobe.conf in /etc as it is written on alsaproject.org, I copied it even in modules.conf. There IS sound, just OSS emulation is the problem
Now it has sound, thank you very much. Also, has somebody any idea, how to get mplayer to work on Ubuntu?
check the guide mentioned in the topic, it tells you
